case.state: Alright, people! Time to kick some butt at cards!
Alright, people! Time to kick some butt at cards!
Can I have ~cards~ cards?
I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~, please!
Weiss! You really came!
Oh, Yang, you're here too... That's not awkward at all.
Ah! It's you!
That's the woman from the ship!
Somebody please keep an eye on her...
She's a criminal, so watch out with her.
Yay! The whole team made it! And for our fifth we have... Who are you?
Oooooooh! I... uh... I have a bad hand... yeah. Totally.
Good luck beating these cards!
It's us versus the world, Blake!
Huh, this looks gr-... garbage! It's such a bad hand you can keep your low pair to beat it.
Alright! These look awesome!
Sweet! I'm not losing this round!
Oh, yes, thank you...
Well I guess I know who's not losing this time around!
Okay, I'll be safe this round at least...
Now if only I could keep getting cards this good...
Keep giving me good hands, please.
Oh, oh, I think I'm safe this time!
Okay, play it safe, play it cool Rubes...
Haha, no one can get through this hand's defenses!
Well, at least this hand's amazing to compensate for this...
Yes! That's exactly what I need!
Yes! No losing for me!
Weiss! You really came!
Oh, Yang, you're here too... That's not awkward at all.
Ah! It's you!
That's the woman from the ship!
Somebody please keep an eye on her...
She's a criminal, so watch out with her.
Yay! The whole team made it! And for our fifth we have... Who are you?
So is having one of each suit a good thing or...?
These look alright to me.
It's us versus the world, Blake!
These look alright I guess.
This will work.
I think these are fine? Yeah, they should be.
Wish it would have been a little better, but this should be fine...
I can live with this.
Oh, those look okay.
Ugh, well it's not too bad. Could be better...
I mean, this should be enough, right?
Hey, can I get a better hand?
This better work...
Not good, but not bad. Just keep cool...
Hmm, this is okay.
I hope this works...
No, I am NOT losing now!
These need to work! They need to!
Weiss! You really came!
Oh, Yang, you're here too... That's not awkward at all.
Ah! It's you!
That's the woman from the ship!
Somebody please keep an eye on her...
She's a criminal, so watch out with her.
AHH! Not when they're right there!
But she's here!
But my sister's here!
B-but my sister is right there!
Yay! The whole team made it! And for our fifth we have... Who are you?
I call foul. Someone had to have purposefully given me bad cards!
Uh oh...
Wah! How do I play again?
Is that supposed to be like that...?
It's us versus the world, Blake!
Why...?
No! These are aw- some! Awesome!
Gah! Those look not okay...
I swear if I lose this hand the dealer's gonna see the bad side of my Crescent Rose...
This is the Cardin of hands, seriously...
That... doesn't look great.
That's a problem right there...
Oh uh um... I have the best hand ever! Don't mess with me!
This looks amazing!
Ah! Well, uh... I have a great hand!
Oh no no no nooooo!
But next is my...
I-in front of people!?
How much lien do I need to pay to not lose this round...?
This is real bad...
But my boobs!
I'm gonna have to show my boobies off!
Oh no... this is not good...
"Oh don't worry Ruby, you've always been lucky!" Stupid lying Yang...
Ah! That's not what I want to see!
So I'm gonna lose my panties...
But I'm only wearing my panties!
Not when I'm like this!
I wonder if I can use my Semblance to get out of here before anyone notices...
Oh nonononononono...
AHH! But if I lose now, then I'm gonna have to...
But I don't even... go down there that often!
Oh, this is not a situation I want to be in right now...
Wah!? With her here!? She's going to see my boobs!
Ah! But Yang's here!
Wah!? But my sister's going to see my boobs! I'm already winning! WHYYYYY!?
What goes around comes around I guess...
Well, compared to all your situations, a belt is harmless.
To make things fair, I should take off these boots so me stomping you all doesn't hurt as much.
Oh, well. I don't need my boots to kick butt today!
Well, I guess it had to be my turn eventually...
W-well, no stockings is nothing compared to how vulgar you all are being!
W-well, no socks is nothing compared to how vulgar you all are being!
At least it's just my stockings... Better than what you guys are at!
At least it's just my socks... Better than what you guys are at!
Y-you better hope you lose now, 'cause when Yang hears about this...!
O-oh, you... you all just have to drag me down to your level...
Oh no, oh no... f-fine! I've had my back to wall in combat before!
B-but I'm... With... Can't I just win!?
My outfit is AWESOME, thank you!
Remnant is full of people who wear awesome stuff like this!
What's that supposed to mean!?
What's that supposed to mean? My outfit is super neat!
You just don't know where I'm from! We seem a lot more... friendly where I'm from!
Red isn't outlandish! It's only a bit of dye!
Yep! Team RWBY is all girls, and we're the best around!
Borrow, maybe not... I'd be cool with letting you look at it, though!
Wow, you have weapons that talk!?
Wow, you have weapons that can talk!? Awesome!
What's wrong with my outfit? This is how I dress!
What's up with my outfit? This is how I dress!
What's that supposed to mean!? I kill monsters for a living, how's that for an ID!?
Wah! With her here!? She's going to see my boobs!
Wah!? With her here!? She's going to see my boobs!
Ah! But Yang's here!
Wah!? But my sister's going to see my boobs!
Hmm, I guess I can remove just my belt.
No harm done, right?
Well, it's just boots, so it's nothing serious...
Aww, I like my boots... They make me feel taller.
Oh, this is just getting lewder by the minute...
My stockings... Don't make fun of my knees, okay?
My socks... Don't make fun of my knees, okay?
I-I have many problems with this!
At least it's not as bad as some others have it, yet...
Oh man, I... well... fine. Just don't say anything to the others...
But I'm not supposed to show that off! Aww, man...
Oh come ON! This is just embarrassing...
Wah!? With her here!? She's going to see my boobs! How am I losing this bad!?
Wah!? With her here!? She's going to see my boobs! How am I losing this bad!?
But nobody's ever seen the Ruboobies! Not even Weiss when I'm changing and forget to lock the door and I forget I live with her and and and...
Ah! But Yang's here!
Wah!? But my sister's going to see my boobs! How am I losing this bad!?
Thank god I remembered to wear this belt today.
I-uhh, heh, umm, that was a practice round, right?
I can't keep losing like this...
Bluh...
W-why am I losing so much...?
What was that?! That should've been easy!
Great, there goes the dress... No one tell Dad about this please?
W-what!? How am I being bested so easily!?
But nobody's ever seen the Ruboobies!
B-but I never...
Is one of you cheating? C'mon, you have to be...
S-sheer! I thought only naughty girls wore those kinds of panties!
I hesitate to think what people think when you say things like that...
Crescent Rose is my baby! Gotta treat her right!
I use Dust rounds a lot of the time. Those REALLY got a kick to them!
Yep, I only use the best ammo for Crescent Rose!
Good eye! Crescent Rose is a High Velocity Sniper Scythe, so you KNOW it's awesome!
Good eye! Crescent Rose is a High Velocity Sniper Scythe, so you know it's awesome!
Good eye! Crescent Rose is a High Velocity Sniper Scythe, so you know it's awesome!
Hey, Dust rounds are bigger and better than ANYTHING you got, Angel boy!
OHMYGOD She likes Crescent Rose!!! So cool!
N-no... Not that I would... Uh...
So is this what happens in your books, Blake?
This is super awkward, isn't it?
At least you're here and not some creep like Cardin...
This is super weird with you here, Yang...
So, Yang... uh... this is weird.
The fact that my sister is here isn't super embarrassing or anything!
I'll just unstrap this here...
Good thing this is mostly just for show.
At least I won't need my ammo.
Is there a place I can put my boots out of the way?
I'll just put these over there...
And... one!
I can assure you this will be the last you'll see me strip!
I'll just lift that up there...
It's a combat skirt!
T-this is my combat skirt!
I-it's designed for combat!
Weiss is my combat skirt buddy!
I guess we're not combat skirt buddies right now, Weiss.
O-okay, promise... promise me you won't laugh...
A-Alright fine! I'm taking it off... Just don't get upset if they aren't big enough...
Please don't tell anyone you saw them...
I guess this is what happens in the parts Blake doesn't let me read...
Yang said this was supposed to be for someone special...
Well, since you're all so eager...
Uhhhh wow, I never thought I would be sliding down my panties in front of you all.
So this is gonna be this sort of day...
Sorry, dad...
Wow... So, you're all just gonna stare, huh?
Oh, man... This is happening...
I don't think this is allowed!
Yang! You're embarrassing me!
I chose to come here, Yang. Let me suffer from my own mistakes.
That's my Semblance! I can run SUPER DUPER fast! The roses are just kinda there. I don't really know why, but it looks REALLY cool when animated, I promise!
That's my Semblance! I can run SUPER DUPER fast! The roses are just kinda there. I don't really know why, but it looks REALLY cool when animated, I promise!
But I like my combat skirt...
W-what!? No way!!!
Wah! Yang!
Y-Yang! Go back to your spot!
Thanks, sis, but I don't think this is allowed...
I'd love to show you Crescent Rose later!
Oh, can we have a playdate? My Crescent Rose and your weapon!
I only use the best ammo for my Crescent Rose!
Barely legal!? I can drink alcohol! Sure it tastes bad and I prefer milk, but I can!
Are you calling me short!? Just because I'm barely five feet tall doesn't mean I can't kick butt!
But I like my combat skirt...
See, somebody gets it!
Team bonding! Sure! Let's go with that!
Go Team RWBY! Haha... yeah...
Hi Yang...
So, team, how you doing?
And voila! My only loss of this game!
I never was much good against my dad...
Oh, well. Now to win!
Don't think I won't learn from this!
You're going to lose next time!
Well, now I better play it safe...
At least I can wiggle my toes!
Time to turn this around!
Well, that's that!
Normal knees...
Wait, did you guys just see my...?
Even without my stockings, I can still beat you!
Even without my knee socks, I can still beat you!
I've been thinking about trying out knee socks.
I think I look cuter with knee socks!
Though now it's not really seeing much combat...
Nope! Not at all!
Well, usually...
I just haven't hit my peak!
Don't peek too much...
Try not to look so much...
My dad always said this sort of thing was for marriage. Then again, he got married twice, so, yeah...
This is definitely what happens in those books Blake reads.
Team bonding! Sure! Let's go with that!
Here I am! Fully naked! Is that what you wanted?
S-so here's my... uh... well... You know...
Man, is it hot in here or...?
You are so lucky Yang isn't here...
Hahaha! I'm kicking your butt!
You won't beat me!
Another win for me!
Gotta keep my winning streak!
Can't stop me!
This is the day we waited for!
That the best you got?
Woo!
You're still going down!
I'm enjoying this part!
Haha! I'm gonna take this!
Don't count me out yet!
One step closer!
Come on! You gotta catch up with me!
O-oh, well, don't be shy...
Almost there!
Almost there!
I mean... You don't have to stop...
Hurry up and get naked with me!
C'mon, it's fun being naked! Not humiliating at all!
Oh... show me something good...
C'mon! I can use this!
Not much good to me now.
Lotta good that does me now...
So, you're some kinda robot, right?
You won't beat me!
Another win for me!
You can't beat Ruby!
This is the day we waited for!
Can't stop me!
Score 1 for Ruby!
That the best you got?
Woo!
I'm enjoying this part!
Haha! I'm gonna take this!
Haha! You lose!
One step closer!
Yeah! I can still win this!
I mean... you could just keep going...
I mean... you could just keep going...
Almost there!
Almost there!
A-ah, don't mind me...
Yeah! Join me!
If it means you could lose before me, then I'm all in!
I'm down but not out!
Hurry up already! I can't hold it in much longer...
Come on! Get on with it!
Too late, now...
Not much good to me now
Lotta good that does me now...
Aww, now!?
Hahaha! I'm kicking your butt!
You won't beat me!
Another win for me!
Can't stop me!
Gotta keep my winning streak!
This is the day we waited for!
That the best you got?
Woo!
You're still going down!
Haha, so what're you losing this hand?
I'm enjoying this part!
Haha! I'm gonna take this!
Don't count me out yet!
One step closer!
Come on! You gotta catch up with me!
Please just lose before I do!
C'mon, it's fun being naked! Not humiliating at all!
Hope you'll be joining me soon!
C'mon! I can use this!
Not much good to me now.
A little late, don't you think?
What do you mean? I'm Ruby!
Yes. Yes it is...
WHAT? No! She's my sister you weirdo!
Hey, sis...
Don't lose, sis! It's really awkward and everyone looks at you!
You won't beat me!
Another win for me!
You can't beat Ruby!
So, uh... This is weird...
Score 1 for Ruby!

state.text: This is the day we waited for!

case.state: Can't stop me!

Woo!

I'm enjoying this part!

Haha! You lose!

When I'm doing... this...
Don't look... I can't control myself...

Bleh, you couldn't have done that sooner?

So... You're some kinda robot, huh? That's AWESOME!

You're a LOT different than the robot I know.
Cool wings, Pit! What kind are they?
I've never met a Faunus with wings before!
Not much, huh?
Oh lame!
Not much huh?
Boring.
That's all?
That's it!?
Are you kidding me?!
You're taking off that!?
Oh, come on!

Oh, man, I lost bad...
You'll never join me at that rate!
I'm naked, though...
That's not fair!
Lucky!
Wow, I'm not good at this game...
Wow, you beat me hard...
At least you're on the way!
I know a certain someone a little like you~
It's too much to ask if I can take a look at all your circuits and junk, isn't it?
Kinda neat that tech has come this far, though...
I... think I prefer Penny...
Is flying as cool as it looks? I can only jump around with Crescent Rose.
How high can you go? How far can you fly? Wait, those wings are kinda small now that I think about it, can they even lift you?
But it is early after all!
Good start, ~name~.
Hah! One step closer!
Victory will be mine!
We're still early, so it's okay.
I guess that's okay for now.
Aww, that's no fun.
I guess that's okay.
Woo! Victory!
Come on! My feet are cold!
At least I have normal knees, right?
I miss my stockings. I feel weird without them...
I miss my knee socks. I feel weird without them...
You'll never catch me at this rate.
Meanie.
You still have that!?
But my boobs are out!
This is so lame...
But next are my panties!
I'm putting on a show, and that's the best you can do?
I wish I was you right now...
I would enjoy having my skirt back.
Oh... At least you're closer...
Why'd I have to lose?
So little so late?
The least you could go is make me feel better...
Man, I'm not good at this game...
I lost pretty bad huh?
A bit, yeah. She gets like that...
YEAH! I'VE BEEN TELLING YOU!
Can I see that rapier of yours? It's super neat!
I wonder how similar that rapier is to Weiss'...
Wow! I'd think that someone of your size would use a bigger weapon...
Is there something special about that rapier? I'd love to look at it for a bit.
Those wings are so CUTE! How well do they work?
I love your fairy look! It's super neat!
Wow! What happened to your hair!? It's kinda like Yang when she uses her Semblance...
Can I PLEASE look at your sword? I kinda... have a thing for katanas...
I'd really like to take some notes about your sword, and I'd love to hear about your skills as well!
That outfit is so cool!, Marinette!
Ladybugs rule! Just ask Blake!
I'd love to show my future kids your cool outfit! It's so cute and red and fun!
That's some neat looking gear you got there, Meia.
Your eye looks kinda like something from Atlas. They have ALL the cool tech stuff!
(She can't be any sort of Faunus... They only have one trait, plus the wings wouldn't be there... right?)
(I wonder why she looks like that. It's super cool, but I didn't think Faunus worked like that...)
You look really pretty, Palutena!
Your outfit is super neat! All those cool jewels and junk look really awesome!
You're very scary but I love your guns!
I'm scared to ask how good you are with those pistols...
Are... Are you a ghost?
Is anyone else concerned with the fact that she's see through?
That's such a cool helmet, Uravity! You gotta show me how it works when we're all done!
Who designed your outfit? Was it you? I'd love to meet them and talk designs and mechanics!
Launch! What happened to your hair?
Oh lame!
Not much, huh?
Playing it safe? That's cool.
Not much huh?
Not much huh?
Playing it smart first? That's fine, I guess.
That's it!?
Ah darn, I forgot you had such an insignificant piece of clothing on hand...
Are you kidding me?!
You're taking off that!?
Oh, come on!
I stopped paying attention! You still have that!?
Oh, man, I loss bad...
I'm naked, though...
That's not fair!
Lucky!
Wow, I'm not good at this game...
Wow, you beat me hard...
At least you're on the way!
Well, that's awesome!
I'm kind of a weapon connoisseur myself, so I'd love to pour over it a bit.
ARRGH you gonna be okay with me checking that out? Hehe...
I guess I'm mixing you up with that Yatsuhashi guy from back in the day, but your weapon seems small for someone your size. He was HUGE! And his sword was HUGE!
So... can I look at it?
Also, why don't you wear pants?
Is there a reason you're so... underdressed?
But beside that... Can I see that gun of yours?
I wield a scythe, but my Uncle always tells me to look at other weapons to understand how they work.
My scythe is also a gun! I'd love to take a look at your weapon and see what it can do!
How much does that cover, though?
Doesn't seem like it has a ton of extra bits.
That bodysuit is pretty cool. The shoulders look like a cool robot!
I'm really interested in how all your stuff works. I love tinkering around with machines!
Uh, I mean, wow, sorry you lost!
I wasn't whispering to myself or anything!
You look like a couple of statues I've seen downtown.
We got all sorts of art filled with women like you back where I'm from!
They don't even look like they transform, but I feel you do well enough.
Can I look at... You know what, never mind.
Just gonna skip over that? Okay, that's fine.
I have a lot of things to think over when I get home.
I want to learn as much as I can about all kinds of engineering so I can upgrade Crescent Rose!
All of your stuff looks super high tech, and also really cute! Such a friendly design for a hero!
Those guns... are... cool don'tkillme...
I would love to show you how Crescent Rose works later! I love looking at other weapons!
Yeah, Crescent Rose is a High Velocity Sniper Scythe! It needs the BEST ammo!
I mainly use high-calibur rounds with Crescent Rose. When I need to bust out the BIG stuff, I use Dust rounds!
Yeah, Crescent Rose is a High Velocity Sniper Scythe, so I only use the BEST ammo!

scene.directive: A forest located deep in the continent of Anima...
You sit down and contemplate why you didn't just take the train to Mistral instead of walking through a dangerous forest...
Maybe a plane will come out of nowhere and take you there instead. Sure would make this entire trip seem stupid, wouldn't it?
Hold on, did you hear that? There might be someone up ahead...
It's Ruby! She doesn't seem to notice you though...
She looks different compared to the last time you saw her.
The fact that she has clothes on is also probably throwing off your perception of her...
Wait a second, where'd she go?
Go follow her!
There she is!
"Finally! I've been waiting for a chance to do this now that the others are asleep."
"I just hope it's not too chilly..."
Yep, fuck the plane. Jackpot!
"This outfit is reeaalllyyy cool..."
"But it reeaalllyyy sucks to get in and out of."
20 Minutes Later...
"Maybe I shouldn't have worn so many belts..."
"Oh well, time to go in!"
"A-Actually, everyone's asleep..."
"So no one would see me if I took my underwear off too..."
"I-I've never been naked outside before."
"This might actually be fun!"
"Wow! I've never felt a cold breeze like this before!"
"H-hah... Maybe too cold of a breeze if these are any indication..."
"Well, here goes nothing."
"Heh... literally..."
"A-Ah... The cold air feels really weird on my naked body..."
"I think I like it..."
"Wait, does that make me some kind of exhibitionist now...?"
"Oh well. While I'm doing all this naked stuff, I might as well try skinny-dipping too like I originally planned!"
"Yeah! Time to get wet!"
"A-ah... that sounds weird..."
You accidentally lean a little too far into the bush.
"W-what was that!? Is someone there!?"
She looks right at you.
"Eek!"
She's gone...
But she left all of her clothes here.
It's a long journey to Mistral, but this was a nice rest stop for you.
You decide to take her underwear with you as a souvenir.
Have fun Ruby!
